title: Ghome Smart Dimmer Switch Single Pole 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Light Switch Compatible With Alexa and Google Home, White 1 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #30,103 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #105 in Electrical Light Switches       #105 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: EASY TO INSTALL: Neutral Wire Required. GHome's smart dimmer switch requires 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection, no separate hub required. Input: 120V~ 60Hz; Output: 120V~ 60Hz, 4A MAX; Max output: 150W LED, 150W CFL, 450W INC. NOTE: Not compatible with smart bulbs.

1% - 100% DIMMING CONTROL: Equipped with a sensitive touch interface, just slide your finger to adjust the brightness, or set the optimal dimming range in the app to create a perfect atmosphere. Meanwhile, we've also added a new Range value to address the issue of a few bulbs flickering at low brightness.

BRIGHTNESS SETTINGS: The Brightness Range in the app setting only needs to increase the minimum value when your bulb is flashing at lowest brightness. Otherwise, please default the Range Value to 1% -100% for normal use.

SMART VOICE CONTROL: This Dimmer Light Switch compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, so you can use simple voice commands to turn your light on/off or adjust brightness. Enjoy your hands-free moment!

SHEDULE AND TIMER: With the timer feature and scenes like sunrise and sunset, you can easily create automatic lighting schedules. Set your porch light to turn on 30 minutes after sunset and turn off 25 minutes before sunrise.

APP REMOTE & GROUP CONTROL: No matter where you are, you can check the lighting status of all rooms and control them remotely when necessary. You can also manage multiple smart dimmer switches simultaneously.

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch works well and is very easy to install, with one mentioning it connects to Wi-Fi without issues. They appreciate its controllability through Alexa, and one customer notes it shows the brightness level.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThinking out if the box
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Used this to go between bookcase and wall for controlling fireplace blower; not enough room for hands

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Ghome dimmer switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This dimmer switch has been great. Our old switch made our LED lights flicker, but they have stopped that. The lights also seem brighter. Love that I can have Alexa handle the work when I don’t want to get up, too. All of the Ghome switches we have are great!  Not sure why our dimmer switch hadn’t been switched to a Ghome until now.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent dimmer with timer ⏲️
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works perfectly, schedule timer works great with the gosund app. Dimmer works great as well

customer_reviews.rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars4.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsOverall Good smart dimmer switch with minor flaws (with app setup )
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I wanted to replace my existing dimmer switch which was flickering my LED lights.This Ghome smart dimmer was easy to replace and works well on wall.Installation Requires a neutral wire (I had to plug in neutral and ground directly inline -unlike in manual) and a 2.4GHz ONLY Wi-Fi connection for app control. No hub needed.Dimming Control is not as described like 1% to 100%. It is an incremental of some 15%.  A touch-sensitive interface switch is great. No flickers in low light.It was hard to set it with it's own app "GOsund" and it only accepts 2.4Ghz wifi. Then it was easy with Alexa app. Though I was not able to set with Google Home or asisstantIt has added feature of Schedule and Timer which is great, I hve not used so far.Remote & Group Control features lighting status and manage multiple dimmer switches remotely via the app.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I love these dimmer switches so much. I have many throughout the house and have never had an issue installing them. The button is very "clicky" which I like. One of my favorite features is that it shows what the brightness level is on the switch even if the light is off. I have also had no issues connecting to the smart life app, controlling with Alexa, and integrating into home asisstant
